title: Soccer Mummy
description: Justin’s soccer team was in last place, until they dug up a new player.
quote: Go soccer mummy! You taught me to believe in myself!
altHero: a mummy with a sweatband in a soccer stadium
alt1: Justin lays in the mud as another player points and laughs
alt2: the mummy’s feet dribbling a soccer ball as other players try to keep up
alt4: the mummy gives a guilty shrug
